name: TradEmploi
description: TradEmploi (or TradSNCF) is a web application for instant multilingual translation allowing two people who do not speak the same language to dialogue each in their own language. It combines speech recognition, automatic translation and speech synthesis in more than 130 languages, promoting inclusion and equitable access to information in public services.

name: EcoConception
description: Static website for awareness of responsible design of digital services. It presents the environmental and social impacts of digital technology, the principles of frugality and sustainability, as well as practical sheets by profession to initiate a responsible design approach accessible to all.

name: Gabarit
description: Gabarit provides Python templates to quickly launch Data Science and artificial intelligence projects. Three ready-to-use frameworks cover NLP, digital data and computer vision, with DVC, MLFlow and Streamlit integration. The objective: accelerate the development of ethical and industrializable AI models.

name: Architecture
description: Collaborative space for France Travail DSI architects, intended to share tools, guides and feedback. This repository promotes a continuous approach to IS architecture: resilient, open, sustainable and centered on collaboration between product and business teams.

name: Words n Fun
description: Python module for linguistic preprocessing for NLP projects. Words'n Fun provides text cleaning and normalization pipelines to standardize and accelerate data preparation for semantic analysis models.

name: Happy_vllm
description: happy_vLLM is a REST API for the vLLM engine, designed for production deployment of language models. It offers standardized endpoints, Swagger documentation and a ready-to-use Docker image for serving LLMs at scale.

name: Embcompare
description: EmbCompare is a Python tool for visually and numerically comparing NLP model embeddings. It provides a Streamlit interface and JSON reports to track the evolution and consistency of vector representations.

name: Benchmark_llm_serving
description: Benchmark LLM Serving is a performance measurement tool for language model APIs. It evaluates speed, latency, parallel generation and GPU consumption of vLLM and Mistral backends, with production of reports and comparative graphs.

name: Fairlens_pe
description: Internal adaptation of FairLens, open source Python library allowing automatic detection of biases and measurement of fairness in data. This fork has been integrated into the Gabarit project to strengthen France Travail's ethical and responsible AI approach.

name: Anotéa
description: Anotéa is a public service allowing job seekers to share their opinions on the training they have followed. The collected and anonymized opinions are reconciled to offer reliable and transparent information, consultable via API and widget on partner sites.

name: Referentiel Ecoconception
description: France Travail's digital eco-design reference framework, proposing criteria, tools and examples to reduce the environmental footprint of digital services. It complements the awareness platform for responsible design.
